expo.name: Tell
expo.description: Tell is a public complaint reporting and managing application. Useers can report complaints using this application to relevant authorities. As this is a Beta version, please install the Expo Go application in android to launch the application. IOS application is still don't have a Beta version. Since this is a Beta version, there might be unknown bugs. We apologize for that and please make sure to inform us about the bug through our communication channel at Gitter.
